product_name: Kurgo Tru-Fit Smart Dog Harness - Small - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Kurgo Tru-Fit Smart Dog Harness in size small serves double duty as a walking harness and in-vehicle safety restraint. Keep your dog comfortable and safe when you're walking and driving. Restraining your dog in the car helps protect the dog, driver and other passengers. Harness seatbelt loop can be used with any vehicle's seatbelt. 5 adjustment points provide a personalized fit for your dog. Harness slips easily over your dog's head and clips in place around the midsection. The Kurgo Tru-Fit Smart Dog Harness has a broad, padded chest plate for protection and comfort. Closeout.
short_description: The Kurgo Tru-Fit Smart Dog Harness in size small serves double duty as a walking harness and in-vehicle safety restraint. Keep your dog comfortable and safe when you're walking and driving.
